str2: No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To boast; I glory (exult) proudly. From some base akin to that of aucheo and euchomai; to vaunt.
Not measurable, immeasurable, to a limitless degree. Immoderate.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From kopto; a cut, i.e. toil, literally or figuratively; by implication, pains.
From allos; another's, i.e. Not one's own; by extension foreign, not akin, hostile.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Hope, expectation, trust, confidence. From a primary elpo; expectation or confidence.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Feminine Singular
str2: (a) I cause to increase, become greater (b) I increase, grow. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to grow, i.e. Enlarge.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
From kane; a rule, i.e. a standard; by implication, a boundary, i.e. a sphere.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
(a) I enlarge, lengthen, (b) I increase, magnify, extol. From megas; to make great, i.e. Increase or extol.
